Html:
Need to know how/where to use the printArea method when saving an Excel5 document.

Would it be before or after this:
$objWriter = new PHPExcelWriterExcel5($objPHPExcel);

If so, how? ($row is the last row in my document)
Like this:
$objWriter->printArea(1, 1, $row, 5);

or this:
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->printArea(1, 1, $row, 5);

Would the same apply to the fitToPages method?
